docs.title: BC-pipelines
docs.text: This project contains some Jenkins-pipeline created to perform Basecalling on the Orfeo cluster at AreaSciencePark. This project is based on the Master degree thesis of Rodolfo Tolloi.

docs.title: Repository structure
docs.text: The repository is organized in the following way: - BC_software

docs.title: Mkdocs Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: About this project
docs.text: This projects is the continuation of my master degree thesis
